name: Risky Rig
description:
Made for ludumdare 40

Created by
@boatsqt
Madeleine Spangler

Risky Rig is a blatant rip off of the timeless classic [Tricky Truck]

Controls
R To Restart
WASD Movement
Spacebar to handbrake

Navigate your rig through challenging bends and jumps to deliver your cargo to a flag in the middle of nowhere. On top of being unable to tie your cargo down, you also have to deal with a truck that will have you doubting if we've ever seen a truck drive, or just had it described to us.
